warnings: ⚠️ MOCK DATA - Mapping based on synthetic signals
⚠️ Real mapping requires real SAE cohort analysis
⚠️ Manager approval required before use in production

ddr.name: DNA Damage Response & Homologous Recombination
ddr.description: BRCA1/2-mediated homologous recombination repair, DNA damage signaling, platinum sensitivity mechanism
ddr.evidence: Synthetic signal injected in mock data. Real mapping TBD from Sprint 1 real data.
ddr.biological_rationale: DDR deficiency (e.g., BRCA1/2 mutations) predicts platinum sensitivity in ovarian cancer. Expected positive correlation.

mapk.name: MAPK/RAS/RAF Signaling
mapk.description: Oncogenic RAS→RAF→MEK→ERK cascade, resistance mechanism, growth signaling
mapk.evidence: Synthetic signal injected in mock data. Real mapping TBD from Sprint 1 real data.
mapk.biological_rationale: MAPK activation drives resistance to platinum through survival signaling and apoptosis evasion. Expected negative correlation.

io.name: Immune/Inflammatory Response
io.description: T-cell infiltration, immune checkpoint signaling, inflammatory cytokines
io.evidence: Synthetic signal injected in mock data. Real mapping TBD from Sprint 1 real data.
io.biological_rationale: Immune-active tumors may show better platinum response due to immunogenic cell death and T-cell mediated clearance.

pi3k_akt.name: PI3K/AKT/mTOR Pathway
pi3k_akt.description: Growth factor signaling, apoptosis resistance, metabolic reprogramming
pi3k_akt.evidence: To be determined from Sprint 1 real data analysis.
pi3k_akt.biological_rationale: PI3K/AKT activation can drive platinum resistance through anti-apoptotic signaling (BCL2, MCL1 upregulation).

tp53.name: TP53/Cell Cycle Checkpoint
tp53.description: p53-mediated apoptosis, G1/S checkpoint, DNA damage response
tp53.evidence: To be determined from Sprint 1 real data analysis.
tp53.biological_rationale: TP53 mutations are prevalent in ovarian cancer (~96%). Loss of p53 function may impact platinum response via apoptosis evasion.

vegf.name: VEGF/Angiogenesis
vegf.description: Tumor vascularization, hypoxia response, metastatic potential
vegf.evidence: To be determined from Sprint 1 real data analysis.
vegf.biological_rationale: Angiogenesis and hypoxia can modulate platinum response. Bevacizumab (anti-VEGF) combined with platinum shows clinical benefit.

apoptosis.name: Apoptosis/BCL2 Family
apoptosis.description: Programmed cell death, BCL2/BAX balance, platinum-induced apoptosis
apoptosis.evidence: To be determined from Sprint 1 real data analysis.
apoptosis.biological_rationale: Platinum kills cancer cells via DNA damage-induced apoptosis. BCL2 overexpression or BAX loss can confer resistance.

next_steps: Run Sprint 1 real data biomarker analysis
Assign confidence levels based on statistical evidence
